code: import React from'react';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import'chartjs-adapter-date-fns';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Smallchart(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:{labels:range(props.now,props.time,props.histData.length-1),datasets:[{backgroundColor:props.col,borderColor:props.col,data:props.histData,fill:props.col,lineTension:0,pointRadius:0,borderWidth:3}]},options:{scales:{x:{grid:{display:false,drawBorder:false},ticks:{maxTicksLimit:6,autoSkip:true,maxRotation:0,minRotation:0},type:"time"},y:{grid:{drawBorder:false,precision:1,color:"#f0f0f0"},ticks:{callback:function callback(value,index,values){return"$"+value.toPrecision(3);},maxTicksLimit:6,padding:10}}},plugins:{legend:{display:false},tooltip:{mode:'index',intersect:false}}}});}function range(now,time,length){var arr=[now*1000];var timearr=[];for(var i=0;i<length;i++){var n=arr[0]-time*1000;arr.unshift(round(n,time*1000));}for(var _i=0;_i<arr.length;_i++){timearr.push(new Date(arr[_i]));}return timearr;}function round(num,time){return Math.ceil(num/time)*time;}
